meanings.definition: The quality of being evocative or capable of evoking strong emotions or memories.
meanings.sent1: The evocativenesses of the painting brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent2: Her storytelling had a certain evocativenesses that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The evocativenesses of the old photograph made her smile nostalgically.
meanings.sent4: The music carried an evocativenesses that transported listeners to another time.
meanings.sent5: The evocativenesses of the poem lingered in the air long after it was read.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being evocative or suggestive.
meanings.sent1: The evocativenesses of the room hinted at a mysterious past.
meanings.sent2: The evocativenesses of her words left a lasting impact on the audience.
meanings.sent3: The evocativenesses of the movie plot kept the audience guessing until the end.
meanings.sent4: The evocativenesses of the landscape painting made it seem almost alive.
meanings.sent5: The evocativenesses of the scent brought back memories of childhood summers.
